TopicTitle: Ksp 2 Eva Chutes: Round and Bace?

Articles.Content:
I think there should be round chutes and bace chutes.

You should be change the type of eva chute. So you dont need to try to land them all. Round Chutes just make  the kerbals flote down like normal chutes.
That would be cool and kinda useful. Also maybe an abort feature where you're kerbals will "evacuate" from the craft so you don't need to keep switching back.
A small QOL feature is to just have the Kerbals attempt to stay in formation so that even players who find classic chutes a bit boring can still get everyone down in a small area without juggling.
Ballutes in the shape of balloon animals.
